Web Forms

May 5, 2007

So you want me to give you all my personal data? Don’t make it any more difficult than it has to be.

  • Don’t make me fill it out more than once. Something is incorrect or missing? Let me come back and fix it later.
  • Make it very, very, clear why your system isn’t accepting my data.
  • Don’t use selection boxes.
  • Don’t ask for data you don’t need.
  • Don’t tell me I entered invalid characters. Deal with it. (BTW: Valid e-mail addresses can have plus signs.)
  • Don’t make me reload the form to see if my username is taken. Learn AJAX!
  • Support OpenID!
